languages.text: "Мертв. Без сомнений. И голоса вопиют о мириаде кошмаров, гогочут над каждой из сотен душ, что сейчас растворяются в варпе. Визг из Святилища Навигатора был звонче прочих — и лучше мы убережем Навигатора, чем какого-то нажимателя рычага в отсеке с охладителями или повара со средней палубы!"

traits.locale_text: "Да, Абеляр. Мертв. Без сомнений. И голоса вопиют о мириаде кошмаров, гогочут над каждой из сотен душ, что сейчас растворяются в варпе. Визг из святилища Навигатора был звонче прочих — и лучше мы убережем Навигатора, чем какого-то нажимателя рычага в отсеке с охладителями или повара со средней палубы!"

languages.text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"
languages.original_text: "Мертв. Без сомнений. И голоса вопиют о мириаде кошмаров, гогочут над каждой из сотен душ, что сейчас растворяются в варпе. Визг из Святилища Навигатора был звонче прочих — и лучше мы убережем Навигатора, чем какого-то нажимателя рычага в отсеке с охладителями или повара со средней палубы!"

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Abelard. Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding a myriad of nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever puller from a cooling chamber or a cook from the middle decks!"

"Yes, Abelard. Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding a myriad of nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever puller from a cooling chamber or a cook from the middle decks!"

"Yes, Abelard. Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

"Yes, Abelard. Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

"Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

languages.text: “他已经死了，毫无疑问。至于那些哀嚎的声音，它预示着无数噩梦。几百个灵魂已经成为了亚空间的一部分，每个灵魂都在高声惨叫。至于那些来自导航者圣所的灵魂，它们的惨叫声比其余灵魂更加响亮。我们最好赶紧去拯救那些导航者，别把时间浪费在冷却模块的技工或是中层甲板的厨师身上！”
languages.original_text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: “没错，阿贝拉德，他已经死了，毫无疑问。至于那些哀嚎的声音，它预示着无数噩梦。几百个灵魂已经成为了亚空间的一部分，每个灵魂都在高声惨叫。至于那些来自导航者圣所的灵魂，它们的惨叫声比其余灵魂更加响亮。我们最好赶紧去拯救那些导航者，别把时间浪费在冷却模块的技工或是中层甲板的厨师身上！”

languages.text: «Muerto. Sin ninguna duda. Y las voces aúllan, augurando innumerables pesadillas, riéndose de los cientos de almas que se están uniendo a la disformidad en estos momentos. El chillido del sanctum de navegantes ha sido más fuerte que los demás... ¡y es más importante salvar al Navegante que a un currito de un módulo de enfriamiento o a un cocinero de las cubiertas intermedias!».
languages.original_text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: «Sí, Abelard. Muerto. Sin ninguna duda. Y las voces aúllan, augurando innumerables pesadillas, riéndose de los cientos de almas que se están uniendo a la disformidad en estos momentos. El chillido del sanctum de navegantes ha sido más fuerte que los demás... ¡y es más importante salvar al Navegante que a un currito de un módulo de enfriamiento o a un cocinero de las cubiertas intermedias!».

languages.text: 「死んだ。間違いなく。無数の悪夢を告げる声は泣き叫び、<歪み>に取り込まれている数百人の魂のそれぞれに向かって高笑いしてる。航宙士のサンクトゥムからの金切り声は他のものよりも大きかった。そして、冷却モジュールのレバー引き係や中央デッキのコックよりも航宙士を救う方が重要なの！」
languages.original_text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ、アベラルド。死んだ。間違いない。無数の悪夢を告げる声は泣き叫び、<歪み>に参加している数百人の魂のそれぞれに向かって高笑いしてる。航宙士のサンクトゥムからの金切り声は他のものよりも大きかった。そして、冷却モジュールのレバー引き係や中央デッキのコックよりも航宙士を救う方が良いのだ！」
「死んだ。間違いなく。無数の悪夢を告げる声は泣き叫び、<歪み>に取り込まれている数百人の魂のそれぞれに向かって高笑いしてる。航宙士のサンクトゥムからの金切り声は他のものよりも大きかった。そして、冷却モジュールのレバー引き係や中央デッキのコックよりも航宙士を救う方が重要なの！」

languages.original_text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

languages.text: « Il est mort, ça ne fait aucun doute. Et les voix se lamentent, elles annoncent des cauchemars infinis, elles ricanent en voyant les centaines d'âmes qui rejoignent le Warp. Le hurlement le plus fort était celui qui provenait du sanctum de navigation, et il vaut mieux qu'on sauve le navigateur plutôt qu'un tireur de levier d'un module de refroidissement ou un cuisinier des ponts intermédiaires ! »
languages.original_text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: « Si, Abélard. Il est mort, ça ne fait aucun doute. Et les voix se lamentent, elles annoncent des cauchemars infinis, elles ricanent en voyant les centaines d'âmes qui rejoignent le Warp. Le hurlement le plus fort était celui qui provenait du sanctum de navigation, et il vaut mieux qu'on sauve le navigateur plutôt qu'un tireur de levier d'un module de refroidissement ou un cuisinier des ponts intermédiaires ! »

languages.text: "Tot. Ganz ohne Zweifel. Und die Stimmen klagen, künden von unzähligen Albträumen, die jede Seele von den Hunderten heimsuchen, die jetzt Teil des Warp werden. Das Kreischen aus dem Navigator-Sanctum war lauter als die übrigen – und es ist wichtiger, den Navigator zu retten als irgendeinen Hebelzieher aus einem Kühlmodul oder einen Koch von den mittleren Decks!"
languages.original_text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Abelard. Tot. Ganz ohne Zweifel. Und die Stimmen klagen, künden von unzähligen Albträumen, die jede Seele von den Hunderten heimsuchen, die jetzt Teil des Warp werden. Das Kreischen aus dem Navigator-Sanctum war lauter als die übrigen – und es ist wichtiger, den Navigator zu retten als irgendeinen Hebelzieher aus einem Kühlmodul oder einen Koch von den mittleren Decks!"

languages.text: "Öldü. Kuşkunuz olmasın. Şimdiyse o seslerin yaygarası kulaklarımda çınlıyor. Öteboyuta katılmakta olan yüzlerce ruha kıkır kıkır gülüyor, sayısız kâbusu haber ediyorlar. Rotacı'nın Kutağı'ndan gelen çığlık, diğer hepsini bastırıyor. Ayrıca soğutma modülünde kolları çeken birisinden ya da orta güvertelerdeki bir aşçıdan ziyade Rotacı'yı kurtarmamız daha münasip düşecektir!"
languages.original_text: "Dead. Without a doubt. And the voices wail, heralding countless nightmares, cackling at each soul among the hundreds that are now joining the warp. The shriek from the Navigator's Sanctum was louder than the rest — and it's better that we save the Navigator than some lever-puller from a cooling module or a cook from the middle decks!"
